original_text:
“Son of man, say to the ruler of Tyre, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
“‘In the pride of your heart
    you say, “I am a god;
I sit on the throne of a god
    in the heart of the seas.”
But you are a mere mortal and not a god,
    though you think you are as wise as a god.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 두로 왕에게 이르기를 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시되 네 마음이 교만하여 말하기를 나는 신이라 내가 하나님의 자리 곧 바다 가운데에 앉아 있다 하도다 네 마음이 하나님의 마음 같은 체할지라도 너는 사람이요 신이 아니거늘

sentences.original_text: Son of man, say to the ruler of Tyre,
This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
In the pride of your heart
I sit on the throne of a god
in the heart of the seas."
But you are a mere mortal and not a god,
though you think you are as wise as a god.
